sentence: The  war  began  after  Hamas  and  other  Palestinian  militant  groups  attacked  villages  and  military  bases  in  southern  Israel,  killing  at  least  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  250  hostages.

sentence: During  the  subsequent  Israeli  military  campaign  in  Gaza,  34,654  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  77,908  wounded,  according  to  figures  from  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
